articles.title: When religion played a role in Bollywood - India Today
articles.description: After a complaint was filed in Uttar Pradesh, a Hindu fringe group in Karnataka called for a ban on Ajay Devgn's Thank God. Here's a look at some other films that courted controversy for hurting religious sentiments.
articles.content: Ajay Devgn's Thank God has landed in trouble. After a complaint was filed in Uttar Pradesh, a Hindu fringe group in Karnataka demanded a ban on the film.
